item.title: About Me
item.description: I am now a Postdoc at CUHK, and graduated from CUHK on Shenzhen campus for my PhD. My research focuses on High-Performance Graph Processing on Multicore Systems, where the irregularrity of graph workloads are exploited to maximize the computing efficiency of modern multicore machines. I am broadly interesed in graph-related problems on diverse computing platforms, including CPUs (OpenMP), GPUs (CUDA), and clusters (MPI, RMDA). The core of my reseach is to investigate the interaction between graphs and underlying hardware.
